blocks.subject: Re: Resume of Carla Di Castro
text: We have many Associates that we have to place within business units.
Thereafter, if there are additional hiring needs, we will consider her

blocks.subject: Resume of Carla Di Castro
raw_header: Subject: Resume of Carla Di Castro
text: Thank you for forwarding the resume of Carla Di Castro.  Currently, our
Summer Associate Internship program is full.  I have responded to Carla to
inform her of the program's status.
